channel.title: Project acceptance meeting | Jie Zhang (张杰)

item.title: Comprehensive Project Performance Evaluation Defence Session
item.description:
“The comprehensive performance evaluation meeting of this key R&D project was held by the China Biotechnology Development Centre, and Chief Yu Huang reported to the participating experts on the completion of the project ‘Research and Development of a Flexible Big Data Cloud Platform Support System for Large Inter-cohort Joint Research’, and the project report and the experts’ questioning were successfully completed.

I am responsible for the summary of materials and docking work before the meeting, as a project representative (this defence meeting only allows no more than 6 people (the number of Subject +1) to participate) to participate in the project defence meeting and responsible for responding to the expert’s questions.”

item.title: Project Acceptance Meeting for Subject 2
item.description:
“This National Key Research and Development Programme ‘Large Inter-cohort Joint Research Flexible Big Data Cloud Platform Support System Research and Development’ in the acceptance of the second subject by Professor Xiaohong Li to the Chief Yu Huang and experts to report on the progress of the subject, through the unanimous recognition of the experts attending the meeting and the successful completion of the acceptance of the subject.

I am responsible for the pre-meeting materials summary, collation and docking work, and responsible for the design of PPT and speech, generating demonstration video, assisting Professor Li Xiaohong to answer the relevant professional questions at the meeting. "
